dublin_core.dcvalue: The activities of rescue and uniformed services require the use of wireless communication devices such as portable radiophones Assessment of workers exposure to electromagnetic fields emitted by radiophones is important in view of occupational safety and health OSH legislation requirements and reports on possible adverse health effects in users of devices emitting radiofrequency electromagnetic field
[Measurement and assessment of electromagnetic fields near radiophones in line with provisions of European Directive 2013/35/EU and Polish labour law].
